EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Magenic_ModernizingYourDOTNETApps_WP_Q218.Download Co
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Modernizing Your .NET Apps: A Path To Pivotal Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Modernizing Your .NET Apps: A Path To Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/modernizing-your-net-apps-a-path-to-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Blog: Help Has Arrived: How PCF 2.1 Changes How You Look at Windows And .NET <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/help-has-arrived-how-pcf-2-1-changes-how-you-look-at-windows-and-net]]>
- Whitepaper: Cloud-Native .NET The Right Way <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-cloud-native-dotnet-the-right-way]]>
- Whitepaper: Running Microservices on Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/running-microservices-on-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal and Magenic can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
